price: 41. ou que son eau soit retenue dans les profondeurs (de la terre) si bien que tu ne pourras plus la puiser. »
arabic: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: aw yuṣ'biḥa māuhā ghawran falan tastaṭīʿa lahu ṭalaban
